On the SKEE-BALL BOARD, scratch only the numbers that match those in the YOUR SHOT NUMBERS play area.
Add up the points that correspond to each of the matched YOUR SHOT NUMBERS on the SKEE-BALL BOARD. (Each matched number will correspond to an individual point value displayed on the SKEE-BALL BOARD.)
If your POINT TOTAL is 150 or more, win the prize shown in the PRIZE KEY. (For example, if your POINT TOTAL is 320, win $20.)
QUICK POINT TOTAL is a reveal of the sum of the points matched on the SKEE-BALL BOARD. It cannot be used to increase your POINT TOTAL.

Complete three (3) or more words in a single GAME, win corresponding PRIZE found in the PRIZE KEY for that GAME.
Words completed on separate GAMES cannot be combined to win prizes as shown on the PRIZE KEY.

BOGGLE™ BONUS

Scratch the BOGGLE™ LETTERS area to reveal 13 BOGGLE™ LETTERS.
Scratch all corresponding letters in the 4 BOGGLE™ BONUS WORDS.
Win PRIZE shown for each correctly uncovered WORD.

If you won, redeem your prize!   See how.

 

BOGGLE is a trademark of Hasbro and is used with permission. 2019 Hasbro. All rights reserved.
Scratch the 6 PLAYER'S and the CHAMPION'S Cards to reveal 2 cards each.
Scratch the COMMUNITY CARDS to reveal 5 cards.
Make the best 5 card poker hand for the CHAMPION and each PLAYER by using either one or both cards plus the COMMUNITY CARDS.
If any PLAYER'S best 5 card poker hand is higher than the CHAMPION'S best 5 card poker hand, you win the prize shown for that PLAYER.
Reveal a "JOKER" symbol in any hand, win prize shown for that hand.
If you won, redeem your prize!   See how.
Scratch the entire Caller’s Card to reveal 25 Bingo numbers, or scratch them off one at a time for more suspense!
Match the Caller’s Card numbers to the same numbers on each of your 4 Bingo player’s cards.
Scratch off each of the matching numbers. They will change to a lighter color to make it easier to spot BINGO!
Match the Caller’s Card numbers to the same numbers on the player’s cards. See if they create a winning combination.

Refer to the prize arrow next to each card to see what you have won.

If your winning combination contains the DBL symbol, your prize doubles!
The DBL symbol on the four Bingo Cards can be used as a Free Space to complete a winning pattern.
Note: You may win more than one prize on this ticket, but you cannot win more than one prize on each of Cards 1 through 4.
If you won, redeem your prize!   See how.
